alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:27AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, LEWIS, BROWN, ADAMS, SOUTHERN CLINTON, NORTHWESTERN PIKE AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 327 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located from Blanchester to near Sardinia to near Lewisburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Blanchester, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Seaman and Lewisburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
